content: bandana cowl no 2 by cleo malone yarn gauge 150 yards of dk weight yarn 5 stitches & 8 row per inch in broken rib after blocking needles us 7 / 4 5 mm 16 circulars measurements 16 5 around at neck notions 18 around at base 2 different colored stitch markers 11 tall pattern abbreviations & notes 1 using the long tail cast on cast on k / knit 75 sts pm and join to work in the m / marker round m1l / make one left 2 k 2 p 1 to end of round m1r / make one right 3 knit one round p / purl 4 repeat steps 2 & 3 four more times pm / place marker 5 k 2 p 1 twelve times k 2 pm p 1 sm / slip marker k 2 p 1 to end of round sts / stitches 6 k to m m1r sm k 1 m1l k to end of round 7 k 2 p 1 to m sm p 2 k 2 p 1 to repeat instructions in brackets the end of round number of times indicated 8 k to m m1r sm k 1 m1l k to end of round 9 k 2 p 1 to 1 st before m k 1 sm p 1 k 1 p 1 k 2 p 1 to end of round 10 k to m m1r sm k 1 m1l k to end of round 11 k 2 p 1 to end of round 12 repeat steps 6 11 until cowl measures 10 from cast on edge to point or until desired height 13 bind off all sts in pattern 14 weave in ends 15 block to measurements
